Translations.Text: denʹ prybude koly kozhna dusha bude sluzhyty yak yoho vlasnomu prybichnyku, ta kozhna dusha bude platytysya tsilkom dlya shchob ni tse zrobyla, bez naymenshoyi nespravedlyvosti

BOH tsytuye pryklad spilʹnoty shcho zvychayno buv nadiynyy ta kvituchyy, z umovamy prybuttya yomu z skrizʹ. Ale todi, tse povernulo unappreciative BOZHYKH blahoslovennya. Otzhe, BOH vyklykav yikh pokushtuvaty neharazdy vysnazhennya ta nenadiynosti. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu requital za shcho vony
kur'yer poyikhav yim z chysla yim, ale vony vidkhylyly yoho. Otzhe, retribution vrazyty yikh dlya yikhnʹoho porushennya
Tomu, vy budete z'yisty z BOZHOHO vse umov shcho ye zakonne ta harnyy, ta appreciative BOZHYKH blahoslovennya, yakshcho vy obozhnyuvaty Yoho yedynyy

Vin tilʹky zaboronyaye dlya vas mertvi tvaryny, krov, m'yaso svyney, ta prodovolʹstvo kotryy prysvyachuyetʹsya do za vynyatkom BOHA. Yakshcho kozhnyy prymushuyetʹsya (shchob z'yisty tsey), bez toho, shchob buty umysnym abo malicious, todi BOHOM Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Vy ne budete vymovyty brekhnyu z vashymy vlasnymy yazykamy zatverdzhuyuchymy: "Tse ye zakonne, ta tse vmiye nezakonne, shchob vyhotovyty brekhnyu ta prypysuyutʹ yim do BOHA. Bezsumnivno, tsey khto vyhotovlyayutʹ brekhnyu ta prypysuyutʹ yim do BOHA bude nikoly ne maty uspikh
Vony polyublyayutʹ korotko, todi zaznayutʹ bolisnoho retribution
Dlya Yevreyiv, my zaboronyly shcho my rozpoviyily do vas ranishe. Tse buly ne ny kotri obrazyly yikh; vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu kotri obrazyly yikhni vlasni dushi
Dosi, shchodo tsykh khto padayutʹ u hrikhovi z neznannya todi kayutʹsya z tsʹoho chasu ta reforma, vash Lord, pislya tse robytʹsya, Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
